dataObjects.rights: No known copyright restrictions apply. See Agosti, D., Egloff, W., 2009. Taxonomic information exchange and copyright: the Plazi approach. BMC Research Notes 2009, 2:53 for further explanation.
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: E Zhang, Maurice Kottelat (2006): Akrokolioplax, a new genus of Southeast Asian labeonine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 1225, 21-30: 29-29, URL:http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:F1EE8A2C-1A31-4A02-AE61-9F33857A85EC
dataObjects.description:
E. kalopterus .

CMK 11613, 13 ex., 30.5-75.2 mm SL, Kapuas basin, Borneo , Indonesia .
dataObjects.references: E Zhang, Maurice Kottelat (2006): Akrokolioplax, a new genus of Southeast Asian labeonine fishes (Teleostei: Cyprinidae). Zootaxa 1225, 21-30: 29-29, URL:http://www.zoobank.org/urn:lsid:zoobank.org:pub:F1EE8A2C-1A31-4A02-AE61-9F33857A85EC

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Commonly collected from the lower surface of floating objects such as boats and floating houses (Ref. 56749).  Feeds on worms, crustaceans, insects and plant matter (Ref. 7020).  Aquarium keeping:  solitary species, adults territorial; minimum aquarium size 100 cm (Ref. 51539).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Asia:  lower half of the Malayan/Thailand peninsula, Borneo, Java and Sumatra in Indonesia.
dataObjects.references: Yang, J.-X. and R. Winterbottom 1998 Phylogeny and zoogeography of the cyprinid genus Epalzeorhynchos Bleeker (Cyprinidae: Ostariophysi). Copeia 1998(1):48-63. (Ref. 28024)
